https://tmrev.io/movie/631799-Beyoncé Presents: Making The Gift 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oiMizO35gnoRf3pODydXg8CBrIv.jpg Beyoncé takes viewers on a journey through Africa with an hour-long documentary special, an intimate behind-the-scenes look at the making of the album, The Lion King: The Gift, featuring candid footage and interviews detailing the hard work and passion that went into her love letter to Africa. Beyoncé Presents: Making The Gift
